ayas.text: alif lām mīm
aḥasiban nāsu an yutrakū an yaqūlū āmannā wahum lā yuftanūn
walaqad fatannal ladhīna min qablihim ۖ falaya`lamannallāhul ladhīna ṣadaqū walaya`lamannal kādhibīn
am ḥasibal ladhīna ya`malūnas sayyi-āti an yasbiqūnā ۚ sā-a mā yaḥkumūn
man kāna yarjū liqā-allāhi fa-inna ajalallāhi la-āt ۚ wahuwas samī`ul `alīm
wa man jāhada fa-innamā yujāhidu linafsih ۚ innallāha laghaniyyun `anil `ālamīn
wal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti lanukaffiranna `anhum sayyi-ātihim walanajziyannahum aḥsanal ladhī kānū ya`malūn
wawaṣṣaynal-insāna biwālidayhi ḥusnā ۖ wa in jāhadāka litushrika bī mā laysa laka bihi `il-mun falā tuṭi`humā ۚ ilayya marji`ukum fa-unabbi-ukum bimā kuntum ta`malūn
wal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti lanudkhilannahum fiṣ ṣāliḥīn

wa minan nāsi man yaqūlu āmannā billāhi fa-idhā ūdhiya fillāhi ja`ala fitnatan nāsi ka`adhābillāhi wala-in jā-a naṣrun min rabbika layaqūlunna innā kunnā ma`akum ۚ awalaysallāhu bi-a`lama bimā fī ṣudūril `ālamīn
walaya`lamannallāhul ladhīna āmanū walaya`lamannal munāfiqīn
waqālal ladhīna kafarū lilladhīna āmanut-tabi`ū sabīlanā walnaḥmil khaṭāyākum wa mā hum biḥāmilīna min khaṭāyāhum min shay-ī ۖ innahum lakādhibūn
walayaḥmilunna athqālahum wa-athqālan ma`a athqālihim ۖ walayus-alunna yawmal qiyāmati `ammā kānū yaftarūn
walaqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi falabitha fīhim alfa sanatin illā khamsīna `āman fa-akhadhahumuṭ ṭūfānu wahum ẓālimūn
fa-anjaynāhu wa-aṣ-ḥābas safīnati waja`alnāhā āyatan lil`ālamīn
wa ibrāhīma idh qāla liqawmihi'-budullāha wattaqūh ۖ dhālikum khayrul lakum in kuntum ta`lamūn
innamā ta`budūna min dūnillāhi awthānan watakhluqūna ifkā ۚ innal ladhīna ta`budūna min dūnillāhi lā yamlikūna lakum rizqan fabtaghū `indallāhir rizqa wa`budūhu washkurū lah ۖ ilayhi turja`ūn
wa in tukadhhibū faqad kadhhaba umamun min qablikum ۖ wa mā `alar rasūli illal-balāghul mubīn
awalam yaraw kayfa yubdi-ullāhul khalqa thumma yu`īduh ۚ inna dhālika `alallāhi yasīr
qul sīrū fil-arḍi fanẓurū kayfa bada-al khalq ۚ thummallāhu yunshi-un nash-atal-ākhirah ۚ innallāha `alā kulli shay-in qadīr
yu`adhhibu man yashā-u wayarḥamu man yashā-u ۖ wa ilayhi tuqlabūn
wa mā antum bimu`jizīna fil-arḍi walā fis samā-i ۖ wa mā lakum min dūnillāhi min waliyyin walā naṣīr
wal ladhīna kafarū bi-āyātillāhi waliqā-ihi ulā-ika ya-isū min raḥmatī wa-ulā-ika lahum `adhābun alīm
famā kāna jawāba qawmihi illā an qāluq-tulūhu aw ḥarriqūhu fa-anjāhullāhu minan nār ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin liqawmiy yu-minūn

waqāla innamat-takhadhtum min dūnillāhi awthānan mawaddata baynikum fil ḥayātid dunyā ۖ thumma yawmal qiyāmati yakfuru ba`ḍukum biba`ḍin wayal`anu ba`ḍukum ba`ḍan wa ma-wākumun nāru wa mā lakum min nāṣirīn
fa-āmana lahu lūṭ ۘ waqāla innī muhājirun ilā rabbī ۖ innahu huwal `azīzul ḥakīm
wawahabnā lahu is-ḥāqa waya`qūba waja`alnā fī dhurriyyatihin nubuwwata wal kitāba wa-ātaynāhu ajrahu fid dunyā ۖ wa innahu fil-ākhirati laminaṣ ṣāliḥīn
walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi innakum lata-tūnal fāḥishata mā sabaqakum bihā min aḥadin minal `ālamīn
a-innakum lata-tūnar rijāla wataqṭa`ūnas sabīla wata-tūna fī nādīkumul munkar ۖ famā kāna jawāba qawmihi illā an qālu-tinā bi`adhābillāhi in kunta minaṣ ṣādiqīn
qāla rabbin-ṣurnī `alal-qawmil mufsidīn
walammā jā-at rusulunā ibrāhīma bil bushrā qālū innā muhlikū ahli hādhihil qaryah ۖ inna ahlahā kānū ẓālimīn
qāla inna fīhā lūṭā ۚ qālū naḥnu a`lamu biman fīhā ۖ lanunajjiyannahu wa-ahlahu illam-ra-atahu kānat minal ghābirīn
walammā an jā-at rusulunā lūṭan sī-a bihim waḍāqa bihim dhar`an waqālū lā takhaf walā taḥzan ۖ innā munajjūka wa-ahlaka illam-ra-ataka kānat minal ghābirīn
innā munzilūna `alā ahli hādhihil qaryati rijzan minas samā-i bimā kānū yafsuqūn
walaqad taraknā minhā āyatan bayyinatan liqawmiy ya`qilūn
wa ilā madyana akhāhum shu`ayban faqāla yāqawmi'-budullāha warjul yawmal-ākhira walā ta`thaw fil-arḍi mufsidīn
fakadhhabūhu fa-akhadhat-humur rajfatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīn
wa`ādan wathamūda waqad tabayyana lakum min masākinihim ۖ wazayyana lahumush shayṭānu a`mālahum faṣaddahum `anis sabīli wakānū mustabṣirīn
waqārūna wafir`awna wahāmān ۖ walaqad jā-ahum mūsā bil bayyināti fastakbarū fil-arḍi wa mā kānū sābiqīn

fakullan akhadhnā bidhanbih ۖ faminhum man arsalnā `alayhi ḥāṣiban wa minhum man akhadhat-huṣ ṣayḥatu wa minhum man khasafnā bihil-arḍa wa minhum man aghraqnā ۚ wa mā kānallāhu liyaẓlimahum walākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūn
mathalul ladhīnat-takhadhū min dūnillāhi awliyā-a kamathalil `ankabūtit-takhadhat baytā ۖ wa inna awhanal buyūti labaytul `ankabūt ۖ law kānū ya`lamūn
innallāha ya`lamu mā yad`ūna min dūnihi min shay-ī ۚ wahuwal `azīzul ḥakīm
watilkal-amthālu naḍribuhā linnās ۖ wa mā ya`qiluhā illal-`ālimūn
khalaqallāhus samāwāti wal-arḍa bil ḥaqq ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyatan lil-mu-minīn
ut-lu mā ūḥiya ilayka minal kitābi wa-aqimiṣ ṣalāh ۖ innaṣ ṣalāta tanhā `anil faḥshā-i wal munkar ۗ waladhikrullāhi akbar ۗ wallāhu ya`lamu mā taṣna`ūn
walā tujādilū ahlal-kitābi illā bil latī hiya aḥsanu illal ladhīna ẓalamū minhum ۖ waqūlū āmannā bil ladhī unzila ilaynā wa-unzila ilaykum wa ilāhunā wa ilāhukum wāḥidun wanaḥnu lahu muslimūn
wakadhālika anzalnā ilaykal kitāb ۚ fal ladhīna ātaynāhumul kitāba yu-minūna bih ۖ wa min hā-ulā-i man yu-minu bih ۚ wa mā yajḥadu bi-āyātinā illal-kāfirūn
wa mā kunta tatlū min qablihi min kitābin walā takhuṭṭuhu biyamīnik ۖ idhal lartābal mubṭilūn
bal huwa āyātun bayyinātun fī ṣudūril ladhīna ūtul `il-m ۚ wa mā yajḥadu bi-āyātinā illaẓ ẓālimūn
waqālū lawlā unzila `alayhi āyātun min rabbih ۖ qul innamal-āyātu `indallāhi wa innamā ana nadhīrun mubīn
awalam yakfihim annā anzalnā `alaykal kitāba yutlā `alayhim ۚ inna fī dhālika laraḥmatan wadhikrā liqawmiy yu-minūn
qul kafā billāhi baynī wabaynakum shahīdā ۖ ya`lamu mā fis samāwāti wal-arḍ ۗ wal ladhīna āmanū bil bāṭili wakafarū billāhi ulā-ika humul khāsirūn
wayasta`jilūnaka bil `adhāb ۚ walawlā ajalun musamman lajā-ahumul `adhābu walaya-tiyannahum baghtatan wahum lā yash`urūn
yasta`jilūnaka bil `adhābi wa inna jahannama lamuḥīṭatun bil kāfirīn
yawma yaghshāhumul `adhābu min fawqihim wa min taḥti arjulihim wayaqūlu dhūqū mā kuntum ta`malūn
yā`ibādiyal ladhīna āmanū inna arḍī wāsi`atun fa-iyyāya fa`budūn
kullu nafsin dhā-iqatul mawt ۖ thumma ilaynā turja`ūn
wal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti lanubawwi-annahum minal jannati ghurafan tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā ۚ ni`ma ajrul `āmilīn
alladhīna ṣabarū wa`alā rabbihim yatawakkalūn
waka-ayyin min dābbatin lā taḥmilu rizqahallāhu yarzuquhā wa iyyākum ۚ wahuwas samī`ul `alīm
wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa wasakhharash shamsa wal qamara layaqūlunnallāh ۖ fa-annā yu-fakūn
allāhu yabsuṭur rizqa liman yashā-u min `ibādihi wayaqdiru lah ۚ innallāha bikulli shay-in `alīm
wala-in sa-altahum man nazzala minas samā-i mā-an fa-aḥyā bihil-arḍa min ba`di mawtihā layaqūlunnallāh ۚ qulil ḥamdu lillāh ۚ bal aktharuhum lā ya`qilūn
wa mā hādhihil ḥayātud dunyā illā lahwun wala`ib ۚ wa innad dāral-ākhirata lahiyal ḥayawān ۚ law kānū ya`lamūn
fa-idhā rakibū fil fulki da`awullāha mukhliṣīna lahud dīna falammā najjāhum ilal-barri idhā hum yushrikūn
liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum waliyatamatta`ū ۖ fasawfa ya`lamūn
awalam yaraw annā ja`alnā ḥaraman āminan wayutakhaṭṭafun nāsu min ḥawlihim ۚ afabil bāṭili yu-minūna wabini`matil lāhi yakfurūn
wa man aẓlamu mimmanif-tarā `alallāhi kadhiban aw kadhhaba bil ḥaqqi lammā jā-ah ۚ alaysa fī jahannama mathwan lilkāfirīn
wal ladhīna jāhadū fīnā lanahdiyannahum subulanā ۚ wa innallāha lama`al muḥsinīn
